column4: For gods sakes people, if you want windows games, use windows...
rebooting isn't going to kill you
ok, are you offering to pay?
No more than I am willing to buy your games for you.
Do you buy your games? If so, buy windows.
yes, i buy games, and they work fine in ubuntu. thanks for your concern, you can go to #windows now
May as well, no one here wants to help with anything but windows games
Yeah, they should. I came in asking ubuntu questions and got drowned out by the game junk,.
the login screen preferences tool has been lobotomized, from what i've seen.
Yeah. it looks like the classic Mac OS\
well, i'm trying to find something in gconf, but it might not be there... have you tried sound preferences, sound theme, "no sound?"
does nothing. like i said, seems to be detached from that..
I finally solved it, it's the file /usr/share/sounds/ubuntu/stereo/system_ready.ogg ... I renamed it and now it doesn't play that godawful sound
